item.title: A DIY CPAP Battery Box
item.description: A year or so ago I was diagnosed with sleep apnea, and since them I’ve been sleeping with a CPAP. This past weekend, I joined my daughter on a scout camping trip to a campground without readily accessible electricity. This would be the first time I found myself in this situation, and as the date approached, I realized I was going to have to build or buy some sort of battery solution for my CPAP.
